meanings.definition: Transfer back the title or ownership of property to the original owner.
meanings.sent1: After many years, the lawyer helped in reconveying the house to its rightful owner.
meanings.sent2: The real estate agent handled the reconveying of the land deed smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The reconveying process felt like a legal dance between the parties involved.
meanings.sent4: Reconveying the property was like returning a borrowed book, but with more paperwork.
meanings.sent5: The act of reconveying the ownership was a relief to the original owner.

meanings.definition: The act of conveying property back to the original owner.
meanings.sent1: The reconveying of the estate brought closure to the family.
meanings.sent2: She handled the reconveying of the antique car with care and precision.
meanings.sent3: The reconveying ceremony was a heartwarming event for all involved.
meanings.sent4: The reconveying of the lost treasure was like a scene from a movie.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing the reconveying of the property was a memorable experience.
